segments.text: I can’t believe how much water is just pouring out of that sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is going to be ruined if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the drain is clogged or if she just forgot to turn it off.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like she’s in a trance, just polishing that plate over and over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are going to slip on that wet floor, and then what?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at her to turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just going to keep spreading, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s so frustrating to watch this unfold and not be able to do anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone walks in and stops this before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
